Package org.cyclops.integratedterminals.core.terminalstorage.button

Class TerminalButtonSort<T>

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.integratedterminals.core.terminalstorage.button.TerminalButtonSort<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITerminalButton<TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<T,?>,ITerminalStorageTabCommon,ButtonSort>
public class TerminalButtonSort<T> extends Object implements ITerminalButton<TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<T,?>,ITerminalStorageTabCommon,ButtonSort>
A button for sorting based on a given IIngredientInstanceSorter.
